author: juanblanco
content: So as per comments: Geth, Input: blockcount is not in hex. Also note the output: OldestBlock is not in hex

author: lightclient

author: lightclient
content: got it - it looks like for `OldestBlock` the `rpc.BlockNumber` type didn't implement an encoder so it just encodes the underlying `uint64` as a number
